name: Rushi R Udatha
title: Java Full Stack Developer • Microservices • Cloud
summary:
Java Full Stack Developer with extensive experience designing, developing and deploying robust, scalable and secure applications in fast-paced Agile environments. 
Proven expertise in building high-performance systems for the financial and insurance sectors, specializing in end-to-end software development life cycles from architectural design to deployment and monitoring. 
Adept at leveraging modern technologies to deliver impactful solutions that enhance user experience, optimize system performance and ensure regulatory compliance.
Proficient in Java, Spring Boot, Spring Security, Spring Data JPA, Hibernate and RESTful and GraphQL API development.
Skilled in front-end technologies including React.js, TypeScript, Redux Toolkit, Tailwind CSS, Angular, RxJS, Bootstrap, CSS3 Flexbox and SCSS.
Experienced with database management systems such as PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis and PL/SQL, including schema design and optimization with Liquibase.
Adept at implementing CI/CD pipelines using Azure DevOps, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform and Jenkins, enabling blue-green deployments.
Proficient in real-time data processing and messaging with Apache Kafka and FIX protocol.
